alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 5:20AM CDT until August 18 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Marion County in south central Mississippi... Southeastern Lawrence County in south central Mississippi... Southwestern Jefferson Davis County in south central Mississippi... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 519 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Arm, or 20 miles northwest of Columbia, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Oak Vale and Tilton around 535 AM CDT. Society Hill around 540 AM CDT. Goss around 550 AM CDT. Holly Springs around 555 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
